attributes.action: Reduced speed limit on the A1017 between Sturmer and Baythorne End.
attributes.additional_details:
Petition for;
1) The extension of the 40mph speed limit zone from Baythorne End up to the start of the 30mph speed limit zone at Sturmer.
2) The introduction of an enforced speed limit of 30mph within this zone from Baythorne Hall to the other side of the tight bend at Hunnex Green including Station Road from the junction with the A1017 up to the old railway bridge.
3) The extension of the existing 40mph speed limit zone on the B1054 down to the junction with the A1017.
